#summary Examples of practical applications of the Avatar Core framework.


== SimpleFeatureSelection ==
The following demo was created using [http://www.adobe.com/products/flash/ Flash Professional CS4]. The interface consists of a group of standard Flash controls used to select the different features available to the avatar as defined in an external XML definition.

<wiki:gadget url="http://www.myavatareditor.com/avatarcore/demo/SimpleFeatureSelectionGadget.xml" width="600" height="300" border="1" />
